name: Pet Jump!
description:
Pet Jump is an endless play style of game where you try to get animals down a set of platforms, put your pets through tough ordeals.
The aim is to not to get your pets petrified but to toughen them.

Dog, cat, and bird are three pets which you can get into the game and they have played in these scenarios.
*Dog – Building
*Cat – Cat tower
*Bird - Tree
Player has to move left and right through the gaps in platforms.

Landing on the obstacles will end the game and be landing on successive platforms without being touched gives a bonus score. If the player goes through 3 consecutive platforms then he gets a super landing. Upon super landing, the platform will break.

There are 30 levels in total and player can’t play any previous level. The goal is to keep moving forward and not look back. Onward ho!

The obstacles are different for each scenario.
*Tree – Spike
*Cat Tower – The wet mud puddle
*Building – Wet cement

You cannot stop playing this game. It is that addictive!

Without further ado put your pet to the test!!!
